event: Traditional founding of Rome by Romulus
Establishment of the Roman Republic - expulsion of the last king
commit_message: Major update: Transition from monarchy to republic

event: Punic Wars vs Carthage - Rome gains dominance in Mediterranean
Social and political conflicts of the Late Republic
commit_message: Bug fix attempt: Various reforms to address social issues

event: Caesar crosses the Rubicon, begins civil war
commit_message: Breaking change: Constitutional crisis begins with Civil War
Critical: Caesar's assassination leads to further civil wars

event: Augustus becomes first Roman Emperor - beginning of Empire
commit_message: Major release: Roman Empire established, Pax Romana begins

event: Pax Romana - height of Roman power and prosperity
commit_message: Release: Golden Age of Roman Empire, territorial expansion

event: Construction of Hadrian's Wall in Britain
commit_message: Build: Construction of defensive wall in northern Britain

event: Constitutio Antoniniana - citizenship granted to all free inhabitants
commit_message: Feature: Extension of Roman citizenship to all free people in Empire

event: Diocletian becomes emperor, institutes major reforms
commit_message: Major update: Administrative reorganization, division of Empire

event: Constantine founds Constantinople, new capital of Empire
commit_message: Feature: Eastern capital established, shift in power center

event: Empire permanently divided into Western and Eastern halves
commit_message: Fork: Permanent division into Western and Eastern Roman Empires

event: Fall of Western Roman Empire - Odoacer deposes Romulus Augustulus
commit_message: End of life: Western Roman Empire falls to Germanic chieftain
